title: Leonardo Sousa | Portfolio
resume: Welcome! I've been a solution developer since 2010, with experience in different projects types. Here you will see studies and cases to demonstrate how I can contribute to the success of your business by offering innovative ideas and solutions.
about_paragraph1: It all started in 2005, when I started high school. I decided to take a Technical Course in Computer Science to develop a profession while I was in high school.
about_paragraph2: After completing the course, I entered a Systems Analysis college, which allowed me to enter an internship where I was introduced to the Asp.Net and C# world, where I learned to like the profession.
about_paragraph3: After a year of this internship, I left and was introduced by a teacher to my first official job. I stayed in this company for 10 years, where I went through several projects, including some in languages such as Vb.Net, PHP and Python. In that same company I got my first Microsoft certifications as well.
about_paragraph4: Subsequently, new opportunities appeared and learning as well, diversifying my stack of operations and learning not only technical skills, but also the part of business vision, communication and even sales.
about_paragraph5: I am constantly looking for new challenges to grow daily, help new developers, contribute to business and drive digital transformation.
backend_solutions_description: Creation and maintenance of APIs, using good market practices, bringing performance and security to your data.
system_integration_description: Creation of solutions that allow searching and sending data between systems, in order to meet the needs of your business.
consultancy_description: Analysis, diagnosis, survey and application of solutions aimed at the development and continuous improvement of your business.
